sentences.en: Check that the user name is correct, then type the password again.
sentences.cn: 请检查用户名是否正确, 然后再输入一次密码.

sentences.en: Enter a username and password to get into the system.
sentences.cn: 进入系统请键入用户名称和密码。

sentences.en: Enter your password, then click on the ‘proceed’ icon.
sentences.cn: 键入密码，然后点击“继续”图标。

sentences.en: Give your user name and password.
In order to log in you have to type in a special password.
sentences.cn: 为了进入,必须键入特殊的通行密码.

sentences.en: Is only the verified link account household and the password.
sentences.cn: 只是验证连接者的帐户和密码.

sentences.en: It is important to keep your account name and password safe!
sentences.cn: 保证您的帐户名和密码安全很重要!

sentences.en: It was impossible for anyone to get in because no one knew the password.
sentences.cn: 因为没人知道密码，所以任何人都不可能进得去。

sentences.en: Leave the password fields blank if you don't want a password.
sentences.cn: 如果不想使用口令,请把口令字段留空.

sentences.en: Micro - motor drive, open the door by inputting the password.
sentences.cn: 微电机驱动, 输入密码,箱门开启.

sentences.en: No-one could use the computer unless they had a password.
sentences.cn: 除非知道密码，否则谁也用不了那台计算机。

sentences.en: Password - protected online file storage. Always available where you need it.
sentences.cn: 有密码保护的网络文件存储 工具 ,可随时提供您所需要的.

sentences.en: Please reenter your new password for confirmation of its accuracy.
sentences.cn: 请重新输入您的新密码以确保其正确性.

sentences.en: Step 7 Enter a new password of the type that you chose.
sentences.cn: 第7步输入的类型,您选择新的密码.

sentences.en: The password allows the user to log into the system.
sentences.cn: 用戶用密码可进入系统.

sentences.en: You must give the password before they'll let you in.
sentences.cn: 你必须给出口令,他们才会让你进去.

trans.tran_cn: （进入房间、建筑或某个地区的）口令，<计>（使用计算机操作系统的）密码
trans.tran_en: a secret group of letters or numbers that you must type into a computer before you can use a system or program
